otherNames: God Eater, 噬神紀, 噬神纪
synopsis: Although he lost his right hand and right leg in a car accident, Beiming did not lose faith in life. After he met a gangster on the road, Beiming was seriously injured. When he woke up in the hospital, he suddenly found a A ferocious dog demon who loves to pretend to be X. Beiming not only stood up, but also possessed great power. Just when Beiming was proud, a huge crisis was slowly approaching him…
